Uses of Package
elki.clustering.hierarchical.linkage

  • Packages that use elki.clustering.hierarchical.linkage 
    Package Description
    elki.clustering.hierarchical
    Hierarchical agglomerative clustering (HAC).
    elki.clustering.hierarchical.linkage
    Linkages for hierarchical clustering.
  • Classes in elki.clustering.hierarchical.linkage used by elki.clustering.hierarchical 
    Class Description
    GeometricLinkage
    Geometric linkages, in addition to the combination with Lance-Williams-Equations, these linkages can also be computed by aggregating data points (for vector data only).
    Linkage
    Abstract interface for implementing a new linkage method into hierarchical clustering.
  • Classes in elki.clustering.hierarchical.linkage used by elki.clustering.hierarchical.linkage 
    Class Description
    CentroidLinkage
    Centroid linkage — Unweighted Pair-Group Method using Centroids (UPGMC).
    CompleteLinkage
    Complete-linkage ("maximum linkage") clustering method.
    FlexibleBetaLinkage
    Flexible-beta linkage as proposed by Lance and Williams.
    GeometricLinkage
    Geometric linkages, in addition to the combination with Lance-Williams-Equations, these linkages can also be computed by aggregating data points (for vector data only).
    GroupAverageLinkage
    Group-average linkage clustering method (UPGMA).
    Linkage
    Abstract interface for implementing a new linkage method into hierarchical clustering.
    MedianLinkage
    Median-linkage — weighted pair group method using centroids (WPGMC).
    MinimumVarianceLinkage
    Minimum increase in variance (MIVAR) linkage.
    SingleLinkage
    Single-linkage ("minimum") clustering method.
    WardLinkage
    Ward's method clustering method.
    WeightedAverageLinkage
    Weighted average linkage clustering method (WPGMA).
